      • createDocument

        public org.w3c.dom.Document createDocument(int viewBoxWidth,
                                           int viewBoxHeight)
        Creates a new document with the provided viewbox dimensions.
        Parameters:
        viewBoxWidth - The width of the viewbox of the document to create.
        viewBoxHeight - The height of the viewbox of the document to create.
        Returns:
        The newly created document.

        Parameters:

        destination - The document the source is copied to.

      • rect

        public void rect(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                 int width,
                 int height,
                 int x,
                 int y)
        Creates a new rectangle in the provided document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to draw the rectangle in.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.
        x - The x position of the top left corner of the rectangle.
        y - The y position of the top left corner of the rectangle.

      • filledRect

        public void filledRect(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Creates a new filled black rectangle in the provided document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to draw the filled rectangle in.
        width - The width of the filled rectangle.
        height - The height of the filled rectangle.
        x - The x position of the top left corner of the filled rectangle.
        y - The y position of the top left corner of the filled rectangle.

      • ruler

        public void ruler(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                  DrawingUtilities.Rotation rotation,
                  int length,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new ruler in the provided document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to insert the ruler into.
        rotation - The rotation of the ruler.
        length - The length of the ruler.
        x - The x position of the start of the ruler. In horizontal rulers the start of the ruler is the left most point. In vertical rulers the start of the ruler is the top most point.
        y - The y position of the start of the ruler. In horizontal rulers the start of the ruler is the left most point. In vertical rulers the start of the ruler is the top most point.
        text - The text to add to the ruler.

      • line

        public void line(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                 int x1,
                 int y1,
                 int x2,
                 int y2)
        Inserts a line into the provided document.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to insert the line into.
        x1 - The x position of the start of the line.
        y1 - The y position of the start of the line.
        x2 - The x position of the end of the line.
        y2 - The y position of the end of the line.
